long_description: Specially designed for power walking and aerobic exercise, the Omron HJ-321 pedometer counts normal steps and aerobic steps, as well as distance traveled and calories burned. Features sensor technology designed to count each and every step more accurately than pedometers that use a pendulum design; also tracks distance traveled. Position the pedometer where it is most comfortable for you-on your hip, in your pocket or in a bag. Pedometer not only tracks steps and distance, but also calories burned and aerobic "brisk" steps. Automatic reset wipes the slate clean at midnight, allowing you to easily track your daily steps and distance. Omron HJ-321 Tri-Axis pedometer stores up to 7 days worth of data so you can track your progress and stay motivated.
